crawlState.description: The condition crawl state. Currently, the values supported are `RUNNING`, `SUCCEEDED`, `CANCELLED`, and `FAILED`. If this is specified, `crawler_name` must also be specified. Conflicts with `state`.

crawlerName.description: The name of the crawler to watch. If this is specified, `crawl_state` must also be specified. Conflicts with `job_name`.

jobName.description: The name of the job to watch. If this is specified, `state` must also be specified. Conflicts with `crawler_name`.

state.description: The condition job state. Currently, the values supported are `SUCCEEDED`, `STOPPED`, `TIMEOUT` and `FAILED`. If this is specified, `job_name` must also be specified. Conflicts with `crawler_state`.
